feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.2
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: import csv files to tables (#7327) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat(rounded-studio): add piece with custom api call action (#7330) @perrine-pullicino-alan
  • feat(gslide): create from template, get presentation and refresh sheets charts actions (#7324) @Kevinyu-alan

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: show project usage for enterprise edition in the sidebar (#7341) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: connections were throwing errors on release creation (#7340) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add perrine-pullicino-alan as a contributor for plugin (#7337) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: removed public schema references (#7322) @jasonfill

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @jasonfill, @kishanprmr and @perrine-pullicino-alan

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: support mcp flows (#7333) @Gamal72

üß© Pieces

  • fix(perplexity-ai): add default model (#7348) @kishanprmr
  • feat(lusha): add pagination for the search #104 (#7343) @Kevinyu-alan
  • chore(google-drive): fix typo (#7338) @eltociear

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: hide platform admins when listing connection owners in embedding (#7360) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: hide request piece in piece selector when in embedding mode (#7359) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(intercom): remove wrong test data for trigger (#7345) @AdamSelene
  • fix: clicking on an issue doesn't switch to the history tab (#7355) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: rename MCP Connection to MCP App (#7357) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(intercom): bump piece version (#7356) @AdamSelene

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: add actions button inside table to make it easier to know how to delete records (#7362) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @Gamal72, @Kevinyu-alan, @eltociear, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.4
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: flows, connections and projects all now can have metadata in them (#7308) @felipetio
  • feat: introduce changelog announcements (#7332) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • fix(onedrive): fix parent folder dropdown (#7383) @kishanprmr
  • feat: Add github comment actions (#7381) @kaovilai
  • feat: add gpt 4.1 models (#7380) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(cli): resolve path to piece build folder correctly (#7393) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: exporting tables in utf-8 format (#7392) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • chore: set flow in view-only mode while publishing (#7368) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: package json (#7399) @aboudzein
  • chore: npm audit fix (#7397) @kaovilai
  • fix: delete env variable for show changelog (#7377) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: enhance nx pipeline by adding cache (#7358) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: type in the code (#7323) @s31w4n
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 6.2.5 to 6.2.6 (#7351) @dependabot
  • chore: fix typos around the codebase (#7276) @hulxv

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @aboudzein, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dependabot, @felipetio, @hazemadelkhalel, @hulxv, @kaovilai, @kishanprmr and @s31w4n

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.5
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add mcp pieces (#7411) @Gamal72
  • feat: add the ability to call the backend using the embed SDK (#7405) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat: added action to get run id during the run (#7404) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: updating/adding flow templates was broken (#7418) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Gamal72 and @abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.6
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix(onedrive): add limit for parent folder dropdown (#7444) @kishanprmr
  • fix(call-rounded): Fix RoundedStudio to CallRounded piece name (#7400) @perrine-pullicino-alan
  • feat: clickup piece enhancements (#7412) @CarefulGuru
  • feat(mongodb): CRUD document actions (#7424) @denieler
  • feat(metabase): new action get graph (#7420) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat: include 2.5-flash model in models dropdown (#7428) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: mismatch between redis and bullmq in redis failed job retention days (#7446) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: make a database migration to fix type of positive variant name (#7440) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: update mcp tool name to match regex (#7438) @Gamal72
  • fix: mcp timeout (#7429) @Gamal72
  • fix: clickup auth url (#7425) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: polishing mcp info (#7441) @Gamal72

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add CarefulGuru as a contributor for plugin (#7442) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @CarefulGuru, @Gamal72, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @ashrafsamhouri, @denieler, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @perrine-pullicino-alan
